about_the_game:
In the summer of 2008, Lin Zitao wanted to hold a graduation travel party for Shen Xinyue, but due to limited funds, he had to choose a relatively remote mountain resort as the destination. They also invited Shen Xinyue bestie close friends, prepare the police Li Mengqi to go together, but because the travel time is Li Mengqi on the first day of training, can not ask for leave, so only 2 people go alone. Halfway but met the car did not have oil and broke down on the roadside in the mountains, Lin Zitao think just now not far from passing a gas station, so let Shen Xinyue wait in the car, he went to buy oil alone. Shen Xinyue waited in the car for a long time, see Lin Zitao still delayed, so she got off in the neighborhood. But accidentally found that this road as early as the year before the public security blockade, the seal was deliberately torn off. Sensed abnormal Shen Xinyue immediately called Li Mengqi's phone, but no one answered, after sending a short message and just buy oil back Lin Zitao explain the situation, two people decided to leave immediately, but on the way back encountered supernatural events both coma, wake up after two people have been in endless darkness...


Game Features:


I. Real-time 2D light and shadow technology:
The game uses 2D technology to achieve real-time light and shadow projection effects, and it is integrated into the environmental atmosphere rendering, puzzle cracking and other aspects.




2. Multiple choices lead to multiple outcomes:
The game uses a multiple choice system, the game process will bring completely different results according to the player's choice, please be careful with each branch option.




3. Multiple control characters and various costumes:
The game uses a multi-role switching system, which allows players to control multiple characters, and there are a variety of decorative shapes waiting for players to unlock.




Iv. Machine characteristic combat:
The game will adopt a very distinctive combat mode, which will present the tense and exciting destruction of the spirit battle to the player completely.
